title.narrative: Mainstreaming project: Support to WTO Accession process.

description.narrative: National context based on national development strategy The proposal is in line with Comoros Growth Accelerated Strategy (GAS) 2 2015-2019 on its Axis 1, Pillar 1 Trade development and promotion of regional and multilateral integration" which underlines a number of reforms to be undertaken by Comoros to achieve to complete the Accession process to the WTO. Sector development/strategy in relation to the project Comoros DTIS 2007 has been updated in 2015 and has aligned itself with the GAS 2. The proposal is consistent with the Pillar I chapter 5 of the DTIS which urges Comoros to integrate the Multilateral trading system."

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
